leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研数据格式/解析/转换生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 解析器 + 验证器 + ETL

tools.name: Tibanna
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow execution manager for running genomic pipelines on AWS
tools.detailed_description: Tibanna is a software tool designed to execute genomic pipelines on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud. It supports Common Workflow Language (CWL), Workflow Description Language (WDL), and Snakemake, integrating with Docker for containerization. It is specifically used by the 4D Nucleome Data Coordination and Integration Center (4DN DCIC) for processing large-scale genomic data.

tools.name: Covalent
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow orchestration tool for HPC and quantum computing
tools.detailed_description: Covalent is a Pythonic workflow orchestration tool designed for research scientists and engineers to manage and execute complex workflows on heterogeneous compute environments, including High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters and quantum computers. It simplifies the deployment of machine learning and experimental simulations across diverse hardware backends.

tools.name: Cromwell Frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for managing Cromwell workflows
tools.detailed_description: A web-based frontend application for the Cromwell Workflow Management System, which is widely used in bioinformatics for scientific workflow execution. It provides capabilities for job monitoring, authentication, and management of workflow definitions, facilitating the operation of genomic pipelines.

tools.name: AiiDA-GROMACS
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that enables the automation and provenance tracking of GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations. It allows researchers to integrate GROMACS calculations into complex scientific workflows for computational chemistry and materials science.

tools.name: CalliNGS-NF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for GATK RNA-Seq variant calling
tools.detailed_description: CalliNGS-NF is a bioinformatics pipeline implemented in Nextflow for performing variant calling on RNA-Seq data using the GATK Best Practices. It automates the process of read alignment, processing, and variant discovery, ensuring reproducibility and scalability in genomic research.

tools.name: ClarityNLP
tools.one_line_profile: NLP framework for clinical phenotyping and medical data extraction
tools.detailed_description: ClarityNLP is a Natural Language Processing (NLP) framework specifically designed for clinical phenotyping and extracting information from unstructured medical notes. It integrates with OMOP Common Data Model and Solr to enable researchers to build queries and pipelines for identifying patient cohorts and clinical features.

tools.name: Toil
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable, efficient, cross-platform workflow engine for scientific pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Toil is a workflow engine written in pure Python that supports WDL, CWL, and Python workflows. It is designed for scalability and is widely used in genomics and bioinformatics for orchestrating complex analysis pipelines across cloud and local environments.

tools.name: ETL-Connector-for-ODK
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin to connect and retrieve data from ODK instances
tools.detailed_description: A QGIS plugin that serves as a connector to Open Data Kit (ODK) instances, allowing researchers to retrieve field survey forms and load them directly into QGIS as shapefiles, geopackages, or CSVs for geospatial analysis.

tools.name: fold_tree
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for creating phylogenetic trees from sequences
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline implemented in Snakemake that automates the process of creating phylogenetic trees from sets of biological sequences, facilitating evolutionary biology research.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for the detection and classification of bacteriophages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assembly data.

tools.name: REAT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for the robust annotation of eukaryotic genomes, providing workflows and utilities to improve the quality and consistency of genomic feature annotation.

tools.name: caper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper and manager for Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the Cromwell workflow engine, developed by the ENCODE DCC. It simplifies the running of WDL workflows on various backends (Cloud, HPC) and manages workflow configurations.

tools.name: croo
tools.one_line_profile: Output organizer for Cromwell workflows
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to organize and structure the outputs generated by Cromwell workflows, making it easier to manage and interpret results from large-scale genomic analyses.

tools.name: precisionFDA
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for benchmarking and validating NGS analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-based platform and environment that enables the community to test, pilot, and benchmark new approaches for validating next-generation sequencing (NGS) analysis pipelines and bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: MAG_Snakemake_wf
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for recovery of prokaryotic genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the recovery of prokaryotic genomes (Metagenome-Assembled Genomes, MAGs) from shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: redundans
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of heterozygous/polymorphic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that assists in the assembly of heterozygous or polymorphic genomes by reducing redundancy and scaffolding contigs, particularly useful for complex eukaryotic genomes.

tools.name: sv-callers
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for detecting structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow that integrates multiple tools for detecting structural variants in genomic data, developed by the GooglingTheCancerGenome project.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Drop-Seq scRNA-seq pre-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the pre-processing of Single-Cell RNA-Seq data generated using the Drop-Seq protocol, handling alignment, quantification, and QC.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the FLEUR code, enabling high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) calculations and electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR KKR code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the JuKKR (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker) code, facilitating high-throughput electronic structure calculations in materials science.

tools.name: pytest-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Test framework for bioinformatics workflows and pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A pytest plugin designed to test computational pipelines (e.g., Nextflow, Snakemake, WDL) by running them and verifying their outputs, widely used in bioinformatics engineering.

tools.name: BioJupies
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of bioinformatics Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool and framework that automatically generates tailored Jupyter Notebooks for RNA-seq data analysis, facilitating reproducible bioinformatics research.

tools.name: MetONTIIME
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-barcoding pipeline for ONT data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for analyzing Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) meta-barcoding data within the QIIME2 framework.

tools.name: MapGIS Client for JavaScript
tools.one_line_profile: Web client SDK for MapGIS geospatial platform
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript development platform for Cloud GIS, integrating visualization libraries like Echarts and D3 for efficient visual expression and analysis of geospatial big data.

tools.name: Express.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow framework for ab initio materials science calculations
tools.detailed_description: A high-level, extensible workflow framework written in Julia for automating and accelerating ab initio calculations in materials science, specifically designed for Quantum ESPRESSO.

tools.name: pgsc_calc
tools.one_line_profile: Polygenic Score Catalog Calculator pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for calculating polygenic scores (PGS) using the PGS Catalog, handling data download, harmonization, and scoring.

tools.name: HiFi-16S-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio HiFi 16S rRNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline specifically designed for analyzing PacBio HiFi full-length 16S rRNA sequencing data, including quality control and taxonomy assignment.

tools.name: bionix
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using Nix
tools.detailed_description: A library for building functional, highly reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using the Nix package manager, ensuring consistent environments and execution.

tools.name: ReAdW
tools.one_line_profile: Thermo Raw to mzXML converter
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for converting Thermo Finnigan RAW mass spectrometry data files into the open mzXML format, facilitating downstream proteomics analysis.

tools.name: PyPSA-Eur
tools.one_line_profile: Sector-coupled open optimisation model of the European energy system
tools.detailed_description: PyPSA-Eur is an open model dataset and workflow of the European power system at the transmission network level. It covers the full ENTSO-E area and is designed for energy system optimization and modeling.

tools.name: VesselExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Automated blood vasculature analysis of 3D light-sheet image volumes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the automated analysis of blood vasculature in 3D Light-Sheet Microscopy image volumes, facilitating the study of vascular structures in biological samples.

tools.name: TlseHypDataSet
tools.one_line_profile: Data loader for the Toulouse Hyperspectral Data Set
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to flexibly load PyTorch datasets and facilitate machine learning experiments specifically on the Toulouse Hyperspectral Data Set, aiding in remote sensing research.

tools.name: inphared
tools.one_line_profile: Phage genome databases and bioinformatics pipeline utilities
tools.detailed_description: Provides up-to-date phage genome databases, metrics, and input files to support various bioinformatic pipelines focused on bacteriophage research.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling and polishing long genomes from nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed for the assembly and polishing of long genomes using long nanopore sequencing reads, streamlining the genomic assembly workflow.

tools.name: tf-WSI-dataset-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Whole Slide Image (WSI) data in Tensorflow
tools.detailed_description: An optimized pipeline and utility set for working with Whole Slide Image (WSI) data within the Tensorflow framework, facilitating digital pathology and bioimaging analysis.

tools.name: ilus
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline generator for WGS/WES data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight pipeline generator for Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) and Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data analysis, utilizing GATK and Sentieon for variant calling.

tools.name: SingleRust
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput single-cell analysis pipeline in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A tool for single-cell analysis leveraging Rust's concurrency for scalable, high-throughput pipelines, aiming to improve performance in single-cell genomics workflows.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for querying small sequences in large genome sets with phylogenetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: ACES is a bioinformatics workflow designed to query small sequences against a large set of genomes. It automates the process of BLAST searching, multiple sequence alignment, fragment assembly, and phylogenetic tree construction.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the CHAMP Quantum Monte Carlo code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with CHAMP (Cornell-Holland Ab-initio Materials Package), enabling the automation and provenance tracking of Quantum Monte Carlo simulations.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to interface with Quantum Package 2.0, facilitating the orchestration of quantum chemistry calculations and managing data provenance within the AiiDA ecosystem.

tools.name: Earl Grey
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated transposable element curation and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Earl Grey is a comprehensive pipeline for the automated curation and annotation of transposable elements (TEs) in eukaryotic genomes, streamlining the identification and classification process.

tools.name: snk
tools.one_line_profile: CLI generation tool for Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: Snk is a utility that automatically generates Command Line Interfaces (CLIs) for Snakemake workflows, making scientific pipelines easier to distribute, install, and run as standalone applications.

tools.name: cLoops
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and flexible loops calling tool for 3D genomic data
tools.detailed_description: cLoops is a tool designed for calling loops in 3D genomic data (such as ChIA-PET, Hi-C, and HiChIP). It uses a clustering-based approach to identify significant interactions in chromatin structure.

tools.name: HemTools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of NGS pipelines and bioinformatic analyses
tools.detailed_description: HemTools provides a suite of pipelines and tools for Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data analysis, specifically tailored for hematology and general bioinformatics tasks, including ChIP-seq, RNA-seq, and CRISPR screening analysis.

tools.name: veridical-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building trustworthy data-science pipelines based on PCS
tools.detailed_description: Veridical Flow is a Python tool that implements the PCS (Predictability, Computability, Stability) framework to help researchers build stable and trustworthy data science pipelines, facilitating rigorous data analysis and validation.

tools.name: ProteinFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing protein structure data for deep learning
tools.detailed_description: ProteinFlow is a versatile computational pipeline designed to process protein structure data (e.g., from PDB) into formats suitable for deep learning applications. It handles filtering, clustering, and feature extraction for protein modeling.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian based VASP Plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA-CUSP is a plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that integrates VASP calculations with Custodian-based error handling and recovery, designed for high-throughput materials science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for phonon calculations using Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that interfaces with Phonopy to automate phonon calculations. It enables the calculation of vibrational properties of materials within a reproducible workflow environment.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflow for training neural network interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow that implements an automated active learning scheme to train neural network interatomic potentials, facilitating the development of machine learning force fields for materials simulations.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP). It provides a robust interface for setting up, running, and parsing VASP calculations within the AiiDA provenance graph.

tools.name: AiiDAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for AiiDA workflows and applications
tools.detailed_description: AiiDAlab is a web-based platform that provides a user-friendly environment for running AiiDA workflows. It allows users to access computational science tools through a graphical interface in Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: An application for the AiiDAlab platform that provides a graphical user interface for running Quantum ESPRESSO calculations, making DFT simulations accessible to non-experts.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with AiiDA, allowing users to use ASE calculators and structures within AiiDA workflows for materials science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA to interface with LAMMPS, enabling the automation of Molecular Dynamics simulations and the management of force fields and trajectories within AiiDA.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common workflow interfaces for materials science codes in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library that defines and implements common interfaces for workflows across different quantum engines (like VASP, QE, Siesta) in AiiDA, enabling code-agnostic simulation protocols.

tools.name: AiiDA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA is a flexible and scalable informatics infrastructure to manage, preserve, and disseminate computational data and workflows. It provides a workflow engine with provenance tracking for high-throughput computational science.

tools.name: AiiDA-CP2K
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the CP2K quantum chemistry and solid state physics software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the AiiDA workflow engine with CP2K, enabling automated atomistic simulations and electronic structure calculations with provenance tracking.

tools.name: AiiDA-Hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for self-consistent Hubbard parameters from first-principles
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that provides workflows to calculate onsite and intersite Hubbard U and V parameters using linear response theory (DFPT), primarily for Quantum ESPRESSO.

tools.name: AiiDA-HyperQueue
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the HyperQueue metascheduler
tools.detailed_description: A scheduler plugin for AiiDA that interfaces with HyperQueue, allowing for efficient task scheduling on HPC clusters within scientific workflows.

tools.name: AiiDA-Project
tools.one_line_profile: Project management utility for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to manage AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization and switching between different scientific research contexts and datasets.

tools.name: AiiDA-QuantumESPRESSO
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: The official plugin to interface AiiDA with the Quantum ESPRESSO suite, enabling automated, reproducible density functional theory (DFT) calculations and workflows.

tools.name: AiiDA-Shell
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin to run arbitrary shell commands within AiiDA workflows
tools.detailed_description: A utility plugin that allows users to run any shell command or executable as an AiiDA process, automatically capturing provenance and outputs without writing a full plugin.

tools.name: AiiDA-Submission-Controller
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for managing large-scale AiiDA process submissions
tools.detailed_description: A library providing classes to manage and throttle the submission of large numbers of processes in AiiDA, useful for high-throughput screening studies.

tools.name: AiiDA-Wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Wannier90 code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting AiiDA with Wannier90, enabling the calculation of Maximally Localized Wannier Functions (MLWFs) within automated workflows.

tools.name: AiiDA-Wannier90-Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90 calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions and related properties using AiiDA and Wannier90, designed to minimize user intervention.

tools.name: AiiDA-WorkGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive GUI and workflow manager for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to design and manage flexible AiiDA workflows efficiently, featuring an interactive GUI, checkpoints, and remote execution capabilities.

tools.name: BindFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for FEP and MM(PB/GB)SA calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based automated workflow for performing Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) and MM/PBSA or MM/GBSA calculations using GROMACS.

tools.name: scispacy
tools.one_line_profile: spaCy pipeline and models for scientific/biomedical documents
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing spaCy pipelines and models specifically designed for processing biomedical, scientific, and clinical text, enabling entity recognition and linking in scientific literature.

tools.name: FlowCraft
tools.one_line_profile: Component-based pipeline composer for omics analysis using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: FlowCraft is a tool for building Nextflow pipelines specifically for omics data analysis. It allows researchers to assemble various bioinformatics components into a coherent workflow for processing biological data.

tools.name: Bactopia
tools.one_line_profile: A flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: Bactopia is an extensive workflow for processing bacterial genome data. It integrates numerous bioinformatics tools to perform quality control, assembly, annotation, and variant calling, specifically tailored for bacterial genomics.

tools.name: BEDOPS
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance genomic feature operations and set statistics
tools.detailed_description: A highly scalable and fast toolkit for performing set operations (intersection, union, difference) on genomic interval data (BED files), essential for genomic analysis pipelines.

tools.name: TOmicsVis
tools.one_line_profile: Transcriptomics visualization and analysis R package
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the visualization and analysis of transcriptomics data, providing ready-to-use plotting functions for scientific publications.

tools.name: kraken2_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for metagenomic classification using Kraken2
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible Snakemake workflow designed to perform taxonomic classification of metagenomic sequences using the Kraken2 engine.

tools.name: ABFE_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput Absolute Binding Free Energy calculation workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow for automating Absolute Binding Free Energy (ABFE) calculations, designed for scalability on HPC clusters.

tools.name: Master of Pores
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for direct RNA Nanopore sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for processing and analyzing direct RNA sequencing data from Oxford Nanopore Technologies, including preprocessing, mapping, and modification detection.

tools.name: Taska
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for biomedical exploration
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management tool specifically designed to support biomedical research and exploration tasks.

tools.name: Cromshell
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for interacting with Cromwell scientific workflow servers
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface tool for submitting workflows, checking status, and retrieving metadata from a Cromwell server, facilitating scientific workflow management.

tools.name: Cromwell
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow engine for WDL and CWL
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system geared towards scientific workflows, supporting WDL (Workflow Description Language) and CWL (Common Workflow Language), widely used in genomics and bioinformatics.

tools.name: Cromwell-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python clients and utilities for Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python libraries and scripts to interact with the Cromwell workflow engine, enabling programmatic submission and monitoring of scientific workflows.

tools.name: GATK-SV
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation discovery pipeline for short-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for detecting structural variations (SV) from short-read sequencing data, developed by the Broad Institute.

tools.name: Widdler
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for managing WDL workflows on Cromwell
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for executing, validating, and querying WDL workflows on Cromwell servers, providing an alternative interface for workflow management.

tools.name: V-pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for viral genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline integrating various tools for the analysis of next-generation sequencing (NGS) data from short viral genomes, used for variant calling and haplotype reconstruction.

tools.name: GraffiTE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detecting polymorphic transposable elements in genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: GraffiTE is a computational pipeline designed to identify polymorphic transposable elements (TEs) in genome assemblies and long reads. It genotypes discovered polymorphisms using genome-graphs, facilitating the study of structural variations in genomics.

tools.name: wdl-cell-ranger
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for running Cell Ranger single-cell analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Workflow Description Language (WDL) tasks and workflows for running 10x Genomics Cell Ranger pipelines. It enables scalable execution of single-cell RNA-seq data processing on Cromwell-compatible infrastructure.

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial genomes-to-report pipeline for comparative genomics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for processing microbial genomes to generate comparative reports. It automates steps likely including quality control, taxonomic classification, and functional annotation for microbial research.

tools.name: ncov2019-artic-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 ARTIC field bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the ARTIC network's field bioinformatics protocol for SARS-CoV-2 sequencing data. It handles alignment, variant calling, and consensus sequence generation for viral genomics.

tools.name: pyflow-ATACseq
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for ATAC-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based bioinformatics pipeline for processing ATAC-seq data. It automates steps from raw reads to peak calling and quality control, facilitating chromatin accessibility studies.

tools.name: pyflow-ChIPseq
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for ChIP-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for analyzing ChIP-seq data, handling alignment, peak calling, and QC. Designed to process data from GEO or local sources for epigenomic research.

tools.name: WISC_MVPA
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for Whole-brain Imaging with Sparse Correlations (MVPA)
tools.detailed_description: A High Throughput Computing (HTC) workflow for performing Multi-Voxel Pattern Analysis (MVPA) on whole-brain imaging data. It is designed for neuroscience research involving fMRI data analysis.

tools.name: ARMOR
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Reproducible MOdular RNA-seq workflow
tools.detailed_description: A light-weight Snakemake workflow for preprocessing and statistical analysis of RNA-seq data. It integrates tools like Salmon, edgeR, and DRIMSeq to provide a complete analysis pipeline from reads to results.

tools.name: Cylc
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow engine for cycling systems in meteorology and climate science
tools.detailed_description: Cylc is a workflow engine designed specifically for cycling systems, widely used in operational weather forecasting and climate modeling (e.g., by the Met Office). It handles complex dependencies in infinite cycling workflows.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug discovery, materials science, and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: DeepChem provides a high-quality open-source toolchain that democratizes the use of deep learning in drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology. It includes molecular featurizers (ETL), data loaders, and specialized model architectures.

tools.name: Dockstore
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for sharing scientific tools and workflows
tools.detailed_description: Dockstore is an open platform used by the GA4GH for sharing Docker-based scientific tools and workflows (CWL, WDL, Nextflow). It enables reproducibility and discovery of bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: WDL Workspace
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based UI for running WDL bioinformatics workflows via Cromwell
tools.detailed_description: A web interface designed to facilitate the execution and management of WDL-based bioinformatics workflows using the Cromwell server backend.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for point defect calculations in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides automated workflows for calculating properties of point defects in materials.

tools.name: MrBiomics
tools.one_line_profile: Modular bioinformatics pipeline framework for multi-omics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework providing composable modules and recipes to automate bioinformatics analyses for multi-omics data, built on top of Snakemake.

tools.name: atacseq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for ATAC-seq data processing and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for processing, quantifying, and annotating ATAC-seq data, implemented as a MrBiomics module.

tools.name: dea_limma
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis workflow using Limma
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses on NGS data using the R package limma.

tools.name: enrichment_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic region and gene set enrichment analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing enrichment analyses on genomic regions and gene sets using tools like LOLA, GREAT, and GSEApy.

tools.name: genome_tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for visualization of genome browser tracks
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for generating and visualizing genome browser tracks from aligned BAM files (RNA-seq, ATAC-seq, etc.) using pyGenomeTracks and IGV.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq processing workflow using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing and visualizing single-cell/nuclei RNA-seq data (10X or MTX format) using the Seurat R package.

tools.name: unsupervised_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for unsupervised dimensionality reduction and clustering
tools.detailed_description: A general purpose Snakemake workflow for performing unsupervised analyses such as dimensionality reduction and cluster analysis on high-dimensional biological data.

tools.name: ClusterFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline tool for bioinformatics analyses on cluster environments
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to automate and standardize bioinformatics analyses on cluster environments, managing job submissions and dependencies.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the ORCA software for quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: flowr
tools.one_line_profile: R-based workflow system for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A robust and efficient workflow management system implemented in R, designed to streamline complex bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: bacannot
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation and interrogation, including interactive reports.

tools.name: metaGEM
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating genome-scale metabolic models from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for generating context-specific genome-scale metabolic models and predicting metabolic interactions within microbial communities directly from metagenomic data.

tools.name: dagr
tools.one_line_profile: Scala DSL for bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Scala-based DSL and framework for writing and executing bioinformatics pipelines as Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs).

tools.name: Galaxy
tools.one_line_profile: Open web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research
tools.detailed_description: A scientific workflow, data integration, and data and analysis persistence and publishing platform that aims to make computational biology accessible to research scientists that do not have computer programming experience.

tools.name: hybracter
tools.one_line_profile: Automated long-read bacterial genome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline for automated long-read first bacterial genome assembly, utilizing Snaketool for workflow management.

tools.name: Cloudgene
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building SaaS platforms for bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A framework to build Software As A Service (SaaS) platforms for data analysis pipelines, widely used for genetic imputation servers.

tools.name: nanopype
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipelines for nanopore sequencing data archiving and processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Snakemake pipelines designed for the processing and archiving of Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data, facilitating reproducible bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: dataset_grouper
tools.one_line_profile: Libraries for efficient and scalable group-structured dataset pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for creating efficient and scalable data pipelines for group-structured datasets, commonly used in machine learning research such as Federated Learning.

tools.name: DeepSomatic
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based somatic variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call somatic variants from tumor-normal and tumor-only sequencing data, developed by Google.

tools.name: DeepVariant
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based genetic variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call genetic variants from next-generation DNA sequencing data with high accuracy.

tools.name: kedro-dagster
tools.one_line_profile: Kedro plugin to support running pipelines on Dagster
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates Kedro data science pipelines with the Dagster orchestration engine, facilitating the deployment and management of scientific data workflows.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A Python library containing pre-built workflows for computational materials science, designed to run with the FireWorks workflow software.

tools.name: snpArcher
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for variant calling in non-model organisms
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible and scalable Snakemake workflow for variant calling, specifically designed for ease-of-use in non-model organisms.

tools.name: rnaflow
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A simple and reproducible RNA-Seq differential gene expression analysis pipeline implemented in Nextflow.

tools.name: htmap
tools.one_line_profile: High-Throughput Computing in Python powered by HTCondor
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables high-throughput computing in Python by wrapping HTCondor, allowing users to map Python functions over inputs and run them on a cluster.

tools.name: httk
tools.one_line_profile: High-Throughput Toolkit for materials science calculations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for preparing and running calculations, analyzing results, and storing outcomes in databases, primarily for computational materials science.

tools.name: IQA-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for downloading and loading Image Quality Assessment datasets
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for downloading and loading popular Image Quality Assessment (IQA) datasets, facilitating research in computer vision and image processing.

tools.name: nextNEOpi
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for computational neoantigen prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for computational neoantigen prediction from sequencing data, used in cancer immunology research.

tools.name: sns
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipelines for genomic sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of analysis pipelines for processing genomic sequencing data, including RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, and others.

tools.name: redun
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow engine by Insitro
tools.detailed_description: A workflow engine developed by Insitro, designed to handle complex scientific workflows with features like caching, provenance tracking, and execution on various backends.

tools.name: apple-health-ingester
tools.one_line_profile: Ingestion tool for Apple Health export data to time-series databases
tools.detailed_description: A server and utility to ingest Apple Health XML export data and store it into databases like InfluxDB for analysis, enabling personal health data research and quantification.

tools.name: ATMOSPEC (aiidalab-ispg)
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA lab application for ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An application for the AiiDA lab platform that provides workflows for computing UV/vis spectroscopy properties using ab initio methods, developed by the Interdisciplinary Surface Physics Group.

tools.name: smk-simple-slurm
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake profile for Slurm job scheduling
tools.detailed_description: A configuration profile to enable Snakemake scientific workflows to run on Slurm-managed High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters, acting as a connector between the workflow engine and the scheduler.

tools.name: scDataLoader
tools.one_line_profile: DataLoader for large single-cell datasets from LaminDB
tools.detailed_description: A specialized data loader designed to efficiently fetch and process large-scale single-cell biological datasets stored in LaminDB for machine learning workflows.

tools.name: multiPrime
tools.one_line_profile: Mismatch-tolerant minimal primer set design tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for designing minimal primer sets that are tolerant to mismatches, specifically optimized for large and diverse viral sequences.

tools.name: era5_in_gee
tools.one_line_profile: Ingestion tools for ERA5 climate data into Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and functions designed to facilitate the ingestion of ERA5 climate reanalysis data into Google Earth Engine (GEE) for geospatial analysis.

tools.name: landsat_ingestor
tools.one_line_profile: Ingestion scripts for Landsat satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and scripts for processing and ingesting Landsat satellite imagery data into Amazon S3 for public hosting and analysis.

tools.name: tempo
tools.one_line_profile: Self-hosted weather API and processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A self-hosted weather data processing tool that ingests ECMWF data and serves it as colorized WebP maps and GeoJSON contours for GIS integration.

tools.name: fermikit
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly based variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for Illumina short reads that performs de novo assembly-based variant calling, integrating assembly, mapping, and calling steps.

tools.name: LncPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for lncRNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow-based pipeline for the analysis of long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) from RNA-seq datasets, including identification and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: altocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for submitting WDL jobs to Terra/Cromwell
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to facilitate the submission and management of WDL-based scientific workflows on Terra or Cromwell servers.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for materials science at LSMO
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and calculation plugins tailored for computational materials science research, specifically developed for the LSMO laboratory.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the RASPA software, enabling the orchestration of molecular simulations for adsorption and diffusion in nanoporous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++ porous materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin for Zeo++, facilitating high-throughput geometric analysis and characterization of porous materials within the AiiDA workflow engine.

tools.name: aiida-graph-render
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for AiiDA provenance graphs using GePhi
tools.detailed_description: A utility to export and render complex provenance graphs from the AiiDA materials science workflow engine into GePhi format for visualization and analysis.

tools.name: OCT-Converter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting raw data from optical coherence tomography (OCT) files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for extracting raw optical coherence tomography (OCT) and fundus data from proprietary file formats used in medical imaging research.

tools.name: AiiDA Explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application to explore and visualize the provenance graph and data stored in AiiDA databases, facilitating the analysis of computational materials science workflows.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A library of computational materials science workflows for the Materials Project stack, designed to run complex simulations using engines like VASP and CP2K.

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system designed for running high-throughput calculations at supercomputing centers, widely used in the Materials Project for managing computational materials science tasks.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, integrating with the Materials Project stack (pymatgen, fireworks).

tools.name: voxceleb-luigi
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing VoxCeleb audio datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Luigi-based workflow pipeline to download, extract, and process the VoxCeleb audio dataset for speaker recognition research.

tools.name: snakePipes
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflows for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of flexible and customizable workflows based on Snakemake for the analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, including DNA-seq, RNA-seq, and ChIP-seq.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome data analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A workflow pipeline for the assembly, annotation, and quantification of metagenomic data, designed to be easy to use and reproducible.

tools.name: CromwellOnAzure
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell workflow engine deployment for Azure
tools.detailed_description: Microsoft Genomics implementation of the Broad Institute's Cromwell workflow engine, enabling large-scale bioinformatics workflows on Azure cloud infrastructure.

tools.name: FHIR-Converter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for legacy healthcare data to FHIR standard
tools.detailed_description: A utility to transform legacy data formats (like HL7v2) into the FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) standard, facilitating medical research and data interoperability.

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automatic active space selection
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic workflow definition for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin allowing the definition of dynamic workflows using Python functions, enhancing flexibility for computational science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin to interface with the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) code, enabling automated quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: biomedica-etl
tools.one_line_profile: ETL pipeline for BIOMEDICA image-caption dataset
tools.detailed_description: Data processing pipeline used to create the BIOMEDICA dataset (Biomedical Image-Caption Archive) from scientific literature, supporting vision-language model research.

tools.name: MToolBox
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for mtDNA analysis from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A highly automated pipeline for the reconstruction and analysis of human mitochondrial DNA from High Throughput Sequencing data, including variant calling, haplogroup classification, and heteroplasmy assessment.

tools.name: grenepipe
tools.one_line_profile: Automated variant calling pipeline for raw sequence reads
tools.detailed_description: A flexible, scalable, and reproducible Snakemake pipeline to automate variant calling from raw sequence reads, supporting both sampled individuals and pool sequencing.

tools.name: pipeliner
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow-based framework for sequencing data processing
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Nextflow-based framework for the definition and execution of sequencing data processing pipelines, facilitating reproducible bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the Gaussian quantum chemistry software with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated and reproducible computational chemistry simulations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab app for on-surface chemistry simulations
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDAlab application designed for running and analyzing on-surface chemistry simulations, developed at Empa.

tools.name: GeneLab Data Processing
tools.one_line_profile: NASA GeneLab bioinformatics pipelines for spaceflight omics data
tools.detailed_description: Standardized bioinformatics pipelines used by NASA GeneLab for processing and analyzing omics data from spaceflight and space-relevant experiments.

tools.name: MayomicsVC
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Calling Pipeline in Cromwell/WDL
tools.detailed_description: A variant calling pipeline implemented in WDL (Workflow Description Language) for execution with Cromwell, designed for genomic data analysis.

tools.name: paperetl
tools.one_line_profile: ETL processes for medical and scientific papers
tools.detailed_description: A library for processing medical and scientific papers, converting them into structured data for downstream analysis, indexing, and machine learning tasks.

tools.name: Nextflow
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven computational pipeline framework
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system and DSL that enables scalable and reproducible scientific workflows using software containers. It is widely used in bioinformatics and other data-intensive scientific fields.

tools.name: rnaseq-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Proof of concept RNA-seq pipeline using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A basic RNA-seq analysis pipeline implemented in Nextflow, often used as a reference implementation or educational example for building scientific workflows.

tools.name: nf-core/ampliseq
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for amplicon sequencing analysis, utilizing DADA2 and QIIME2 for processing and analyzing microbial community data.

tools.name: nf-core/atacseq
tools.one_line_profile: ATAC-seq peak-calling and QC analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible analysis pipeline for ATAC-seq data, including quality control, alignment, and peak calling steps.

tools.name: nf-core/bacass
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial assembly and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes from NGS data.

tools.name: nf-core/chipseq
tools.one_line_profile: ChIP-seq peak-calling and differential analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for ChIP-seq data analysis, covering QC, alignment, peak calling, and differential binding analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/cutandrun
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG experiments
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the analysis of CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG chromatin profiling data, including QC, spike-in normalization, and peak calling.

tools.name: nf-core/differentialabundance
tools.one_line_profile: Differential abundance analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing differential abundance analysis on feature matrices (e.g., from RNA-seq), generating plots and reports.

tools.name: nf-core/eager
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully reproducible pipeline for the analysis of ancient DNA (aDNA) data, handling specific characteristics like damage patterns and contamination.

tools.name: nf-core/fetchngs
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to fetch metadata and raw FastQ files
tools.detailed_description: A utility pipeline to retrieve sequencing metadata and raw FastQ files from public databases like SRA, ENA, and DDBJ for downstream analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Screening for functional and natural product gene sequences
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for screening (meta-)genomes for functional genes and biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs), aiding in natural product discovery.

tools.name: nf-core/hic
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Chromosome Conformation Capture data (Hi-C)
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing Hi-C data, including mapping, filtering, matrix generation, and quality control to study 3D genome organization.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the assembly, binning, and taxonomic classification of metagenomic data to reconstruct Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/methylseq
tools.one_line_profile: Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of Bisulfite-Sequencing data to study DNA methylation, supporting various alignment and methylation calling tools.

tools.name: nf-core/nanoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore demultiplexing, QC and alignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for analyzing Oxford Nanopore sequencing data, including demultiplexing, quality control, and alignment steps.

tools.name: nf-core/oncoanalyser
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive cancer DNA/RNA analysis and reporting pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the analysis of cancer DNA and RNA sequencing data, providing comprehensive reporting for oncology research.

tools.name: nf-core/pangenome
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to render sequences into a pangenome graph
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that constructs pangenome graphs from a collection of genomic sequences, facilitating comparative genomics analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinfold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein 3D structure prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for predicting protein 3D structures from amino acid sequences, integrating tools like AlphaFold2 and ColabFold for structural biology research.

tools.name: nf-core/raredisease
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline for rare disease analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to call and score variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data specifically for rare disease patients.

tools.name: nf-core/rnafusion
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis pipeline for gene fusion detection
tools.detailed_description: A specialized RNA-seq analysis pipeline focused on the detection of gene fusions, utilizing multiple fusion callers for robust identification.

tools.name: nf-core/rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A standard RNA-seq analysis pipeline performing alignment (STAR, HISAT2), quantification (Salmon, RSEM), and extensive quality control for gene and isoform expression analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline for germline and somatic variants
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for detecting germline or somatic variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) or targeted sequencing data, including preprocessing and annotation.

tools.name: nf-core/scdownstream
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell transcriptomics downstream analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the downstream analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, handling quality control, data integration, and visualization.

tools.name: nf-core/scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-Seq processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-Seq data from barcode-based protocols (10x, DropSeq, SmartSeq), supporting alignment and empty-droplet detection.

tools.name: nf-core/smrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Small-RNA sequencing analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline dedicated to the analysis of small-RNA sequencing data, including miRNA identification and quantification.

tools.name: nf-core/spatialvi
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing spatially-resolved gene counts alongside image data, specifically designed for 10x Genomics Visium transcriptomics.

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline for metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelized pipeline for taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data using multiple profiling tools.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly and variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the assembly of viral genomes and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling, useful for viral surveillance.

tools.name: b2luigi
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow scheduling library for Belle II analysis (basf2)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library extending Luigi to handle task scheduling and batch job execution specifically for the Belle II Analysis Software Framework (basf2) in high-energy physics.

tools.name: distiller-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Modular Hi-C mapping pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based data processing pipeline for mapping and processing Hi-C (chromosome conformation capture) data.

tools.name: OpenMOLE
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow engine for exploration of simulation models
tools.detailed_description: A platform designed for the exploration, calibration, and sensitivity analysis of scientific simulation models using high-throughput computing.

tools.name: neoantigen-vaccine-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for patient-specific cancer neoantigen vaccine selection
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that processes sequencing data to identify and select patient-specific cancer neoantigens for vaccine development.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated bacterial genome assembly and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline for the assembly, annotation, and analysis of bacterial genomes, integrating multiple bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for plotting electronic band structures
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget designed for the visualization of electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) in materials science and physics.

tools.name: SciLuigi
tools.one_line_profile: Helper library for writing scientific workflows in Luigi
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight wrapper around Spotify's Luigi workflow library, designed to make writing scientific workflows more fluent, flexible, and modular. It addresses specific needs in bioinformatics and computational science pipelines.

tools.name: Python Workflow Definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperability layer for materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A project defining common python interfaces for workflows in materials science, enabling interoperability between different workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and PyIron.

tools.name: What the Phage
tools.one_line_profile: Phage identification and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based bioinformatics pipeline for the identification and annotation of bacteriophage sequences from metagenomic data. It integrates multiple phage detection tools into a reproducible workflow.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomics hybrid assembly and binning pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for hybrid assembly (using long and short reads) and recovery of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs). It automates the workflow from raw reads to high-quality bins.

tools.name: law
tools.one_line_profile: Luigi Analysis Workflow for High Energy Physics
tools.detailed_description: A python package to build complex and large-scale task workflows. It extends Luigi with features specifically useful for High Energy Physics (HEP) analyses, such as remote job submission (HTCondor, Slurm) and environment sandboxing.

tools.name: NetworkCommons
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for inferring context-specific protein interaction networks
tools.detailed_description: A community-driven platform designed to simplify access to tools and resources for inferring context-specific protein interaction networks by integrating context-agnostic prior knowledge with omics data.

tools.name: scDataset
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable data loading library for large-scale single-cell omics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for efficient and scalable data loading of large-scale single-cell omics data, facilitating deep learning applications in bioinformatics.

tools.name: SciPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow library for building complex scientific pipelines in Go
tools.detailed_description: A robust and flexible workflow library written in Go, designed for building complex, resource-efficient scientific pipelines with support for provenance tracking and command-line execution.

tools.name: PyDESeq2
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the DESeq2 pipeline for bulk RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the DESeq2 statistical method for differential expression analysis of bulk RNA-seq data, enabling integration with Python-based data science workflows.

tools.name: wdlRunR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for running WDL workflows for genomic data science
tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling the execution and management of WDL (Workflow Description Language) workflows directly from R, facilitating reproducible genomic data science backed by cloud resources.

tools.name: Nextflow Tower
tools.one_line_profile: Monitoring and management platform for Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A centralized platform for monitoring, logging, and managing Nextflow data analysis pipelines, providing visibility and control over distributed scientific workflows.

tools.name: Sequana
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake pipelines for NGS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of Snakemake pipelines and Python tools dedicated to the analysis of Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, covering various tasks such as quality control, variant calling, and coverage analysis.

tools.name: hecatomb
tools.one_line_profile: Virome analysis pipeline for Illumina sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for the analysis of viral metagenomes (viromes) from Illumina sequencing data, handling processing, assembly, and taxonomic assignment.

tools.name: AiiDA-Siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin and workflows for the SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the SIESTA Density Functional Theory (DFT) code, enabling automated and reproducible materials science simulations.

tools.name: CeleScope
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell analysis pipelines for Singleron data
tools.detailed_description: A suite of bioinformatics pipelines for processing single-cell sequencing data generated by Singleron platforms, covering various assays like RNA-seq and VDJ.

tools.name: snakefiles
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake workflows for RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of reusable Snakemake workflow definitions (Snakefiles) for common RNA-seq data analysis tasks, including alignment with STAR and quantification with Kallisto.

tools.name: cookiecutter-snakemake-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Standard template for creating Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Cookiecutter template designed to standardize the structure of Snakemake workflows, promoting best practices and reproducibility in scientific data analysis pipelines.

tools.name: dna-seq-gatk-variant-calling
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline implementing GATK best-practices for DNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow that implements the GATK best-practices for DNA-seq variant calling, ensuring reproducible and scalable genomic analysis.

tools.name: dna-seq-varlociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for small and structural variant calling using Varlociraptor
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow designed for calling small and structural variants across various scenarios (tumor/normal, germline, pedigree, etc.) using the unified statistical model of Varlociraptor.

tools.name: rna-seq-kallisto-sleuth
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow that performs differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data utilizing Kallisto for pseudo-alignment and Sleuth for statistical analysis.

tools.name: rna-seq-star-deseq2
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis workflow using STAR and DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A standard Snakemake workflow for RNA-sequencing analysis that employs STAR for alignment and DESeq2 for differential expression analysis.

tools.name: Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for reproducible data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system that aims to reduce the complexity of creating facsimiles of data analysis to create reproducible and scalable data analyses. It is widely used in bioinformatics and scientific computing.

tools.name: Bpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for running and managing bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Bpipe is a tool for running and managing bioinformatics pipelines. It provides a domain specific language for defining pipelines and handles task execution, parallelism, and reporting.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow platform that interfaces with Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP), enabling automated calculations and simulations in materials science.

tools.name: St. Jude Cloud Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics workflows for St. Jude Cloud
tools.detailed_description: A collection of bioinformatics workflows written in WDL, developed for and used on the St. Jude Cloud project for genomic analysis.

tools.name: Sunbeam
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible metagenomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A robust and extensible pipeline for metagenomics analysis, handling quality control, assembly, and classification of sequencing data.

tools.name: bio-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of bioinformatics analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of lightweight bioinformatics analysis pipelines and scripts for specific tasks such as assembly, mapping, and annotation, developed by Tang Haibao.

tools.name: GarminDB
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to parse and analyze Garmin/Fitbit health data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to download, parse, and analyze health and activity data from Garmin Connect, Garmin watches, and FitBit devices, storing it in a SQLite database for analysis.

tools.name: scib-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for benchmarking single-cell data integration methods
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible pipeline built with Snakemake to benchmark various single-cell data integration methods using the scIB (Single-Cell Integration Benchmarking) package. It automates the execution of integration tasks and metric evaluation.

tools.name: UGENE
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated bioinformatics software for sequence analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A free open-source cross-platform bioinformatics software suite. It integrates dozens of popular bioinformatics tools and algorithms for sequence alignment, assembly, and analysis into a single graphical interface, facilitating complex workflows.

tools.name: pyrpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for creating reproducible bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables the creation of reproducible bioinformatics pipelines by providing a wrapper around Unix tools and commands. It facilitates the integration of various bioinformatics tools into Python scripts with logging and report generation.

tools.name: seq2science
tools.one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing and analysis workflows for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of automated and customizable workflows for preprocessing Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, including ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq, and RNA-seq. It handles downloading, alignment, and quality control.

tools.name: vsn-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Nextflow pipelines for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of Nextflow DSL2 pipelines specifically designed for processing and analyzing single-cell sequencing data, maintained by the VIB Single Cell Core.

tools.name: UAVS
tools.one_line_profile: Intelligent UAV path planning and simulation platform
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive simulation system for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) focusing on path planning, formation control, and mission simulation in complex environments. It integrates model building, automated control, and route verification.

tools.name: scATAC-pro
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive workflow for single-cell ATAC-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for processing, analyzing, and visualizing single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scATAC-seq) data. It provides a complete workflow from raw data processing to downstream analysis like clustering and motif enrichment.

tools.name: nano-snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for structural variant analysis from Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Snakemake for analyzing structural variants (SV) using data from Oxford Nanopore sequencing. It automates the workflow for long-read genomic analysis.

tools.name: flo
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for lifting over genome annotations within the same species
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based pipeline designed to lift over genome annotations from one assembly to another within the same species, facilitating genomic data migration and comparison.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the Yambo code. It enables automated high-throughput calculations for many-body perturbation theory (MBPT) in materials science.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CASTEP DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides an interface to CASTEP, a leading code for calculating the properties of materials from first principles. It facilitates automated DFT calculations and provenance tracking.
